subject: New York City Marathon
Rescues
Marathon Running
Mines and Mining
lead_paragraph: Edison Peña will run again in the New York City Marathon, but he and many of the other miners have faced struggles after the worldwide attention faded following their dramatic rescue.
snippet: Edison Peña will run again in the New York City Marathon, but he and many of the other miners have faced struggles after the worldwide attention faded following their dramatic rescue.
